website_summaries.verdict: The Plugged Crown is an attractive, comfortable pair of headphones with a solid, lows-and-mids-focused sound signature.
pros: Good bass response and overall audio performance at moderate volume levels
Two detachable cables—one for Android, one for iOS
cons: Some distortion at top volumes on tracks with deep bass
Sound signature could use more crisp detail in the high-mids and highs

customer_reviews.title: These cans a amazing! I got them today and I can tell ...
customer_reviews.text: These cans are amazing! I got them today and I can tell whoever reading this that you will be happy you purchased these cans. Sound quality is among the best I have ever heard. Seriously! Back just to say these things are nice. 👌🏾👌🏾
customer_reviews.author: Jacolby Green

customer_reviews.title: Top notch!
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound and excellent packaging. Premium experience. I am a Jaybird man but when I wand to be immersed in sound this is my choice.
customer_reviews.author: J. McNichols

customer_reviews.text: i'm listening to music with them on, as we speak! just got them in the mail today, and all the reviews are true. sexy ass packaging, stellar carrying case, attention to detail as in the aux cords being labeled "apple" and "android". superb sound quality, i just fell in love with my music in a whole new way! super comfortable too... word up, Plugged. thanks for your creation, my ears are so happy! oh, and i got a 25$ discount because i ordered the black/gold ones instead of the white (which i really wanted, but black is worth 25$ in my opinion;) love, tara
customer_reviews.author: tara murphy

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I have used Bose and Beats in the past and decided to give Plugged a try after reading about them. The sound quality and clarity is so much better than the other pairs I have owned, it really sounds like you are at a concert. They are also really comfortable to wear. The headphones are so sleek and good looking. The packaging was fantastic. This is all around a great product! I look forward to putting these on!
customer_reviews.author: Sameer Paroo

customer_reviews.title: Bad Sound Quality. Probably got a dud.
customer_reviews.text: Headphones worked for a bit, then the audio got tinny and very low quality. I tried various eqs but it still didn't give quality sound. Suspect I got a bad pair of headphones, but I didn't have the time to ask for a replacement. This sucked since the look and the feels is definitely good.
customer_reviews.author: Alonso Acuna

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality.
customer_reviews.text: This feels and sounds like a 300 dollar product. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas A. Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones a few weeks ago and so far they have lived up to great expectations. They fit very well over the ears and although they aren't real noise cancellation headphones they still block out ambient noise. The music quality is great and sounds better than my Beats headphones. The package is also really nice and providing two sets of cables for Android and iPhone is a great touch. Overall its a great buy and you really cannot beat it at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Aamil Noorani

customer_reviews.title: Luxury, Quality and Comfort!!!  A++++++++
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pair of headphones! The sound quality is fantastic and what sweetens the deal is you are getting well built luxurious headphones made with high quality material, higher quality than Dr. Dre's Beats brand. Forget Beats or other luxury headphones and buy these, you will save yourself money and appreciate me why you decided to purchase this out of this world product.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! These headphones are amazing!! BUY this, now!! They're comfortable and can be worn while you have glasses on (like me). The mic has crystal clear sound, too. Two thumbs WAY up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A.

customer_reviews.title: There was a short in the cable when I received ...
customer_reviews.text: There was a short in the cable when I received it, inline controls and mic felt cheap and chintzy, sound was mediocre and output was lackluster. The headset was gorgeous, but I didn't buy these to be a fashion accessory.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: A great Bose alternative.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously awesome headphones! Great sound! Great build quality. Seems like a steal for $99. A great Bose alternative.
customer_reviews.author: John Nicpon

customer_reviews.title: DOPE
customer_reviews.text: DOPE SOUND, FEEL AND QUALITY!!! ABOUT TO PURCHASE ANOTHER FOR MY HUSBAND!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Petit

customer_reviews.title: Good sound balance
customer_reviews.text: First over the ear headphones and I'm impressed. Good sound balance.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Scharborough Jr.

customer_reviews.title: better than beats
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound. better than beats, but in my opinion, not crisp enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and listen to HD flac music through good quality equipment a couple hours a day
customer_reviews.text: I've have a number of quality headphones all the way up to $1,000, and listen to HD flac music through good quality equipment a couple hours a day. With that said these headphones have a very solid build and they've done well with quality materials. They're probably worth the price, but to state that they are worth twice the price is just not justified. For just $18 more I would grab a pair of Audio-Technica- ATH50x, they have much, much better sound quality. I'm going to give them some more time to see if they will improve with some more burn in time, but they have a way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Baker

customer_reviews.title: Fairly comfortable, but one ear stopped working after 1 month of use
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about these headphones at first. The styling is great and the sound quality was good (I'm no audiophile, but I couldn't find anything lacking). The only issue I had was the occasional headache from the pressure on my head, but I would just take a break for a while. Overall they were a comfortable fit for about 2-3 hours without a break. Unfortunately about a month in the left ear stopped working and I had to return them. It's a shame because I liked them quite a lot!
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: The quality wasn't great either. I don't recommend buying them
customer_reviews.text: Only one side worked. The quality wasn't great either. I don't recommend buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look nice if your not interested in audio quality
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly poor audio quality - great bottom end.. But that's it - if you want crystal clear high end look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: HeySupDan

customer_reviews.title: The headphone is awesome! I like it and I thinks you will ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave 3 stars because my box has damage I'd say minor its not that big deal. The headphone is awesome! I like it and I thinks you will like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Jogenio

customer_reviews.title: Plugged went above and beyond with these headphones!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my Stepson. They are incredible!! He's been asking for more expensive ones for a long while. He opened them and went right on PSN. He is completely amazed at the quality! He could hear everything going on and the noise canceling was amazing! The packaging was incredible! Very clean and sleek! Love the carring case that has pockets! He won't be losing anything any time soon! I tried them on my iPhone 6s and WOW Incredible! MY only problem now is that everyone in my house wants them including me!!! LOL way beyond 5 stars!! WAY TO GO Plugged for making incredible Headphones!! In my opinion, they blow the other guys away!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Gal

customer_reviews.title: What can you say when you've just tested one of the best sounding headphones around
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!!! What can you say when you've just tested one of the best sounding headphones around???? I seriously tried it them on the moment they arrived and was addicted to the great sounding beats immediately! Funny thing was I had a migraine prior to receiving these headphones and after an hour or so of listening to some great Pandora beats on them, my migraine went away! It doesn't get any better than that 💝! I'm hooked! I give these a 5-star rating and highly recommend to any music lover looking for a great set of headphones! Disclaimer: I received this item at a promotional discount in exchange for my product evaluation, testing and review.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Maria

customer_reviews.title: Design, Quality, Comfortable, and great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Design - Very sleek and stylish. I have been asked multiple times about these headphones. Quality - Very durable and strong. Comfortable - Used these headphones on multiple long journeys and had them on for hours (international flights). Sound - I listen to all different types of genres and these headphones did not miss a beat. Deliver nice, clean, and clear sound. I would highly recommend these headphones to anyone that is currently in the market for over the ear headphones. A very high-end quality product for the fraction of the price. You will not find headphones for a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: tmp1226

customer_reviews.title: Clean Sound!
customer_reviews.text: As Audio Engineer i have gone through all sorts of headphones for reference or just to listen to some music during a flight and these headphones sound amazing with a natural frequency response and not your typical "smiley face EQ" response where you have too much low (Bass) and high end. Not to mention the Design with clean look, scratch resistant and pillow pouch they come with are a plus. I strongly recommend these headphones whether just for the enjoyment of the listen or for those that work in the audio engineering industry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Build and Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift a few months back and had the sole intention of using them for when i travel. I have used them a few times now and i feel the sound quality is right where it should be for a pair of headphones in this price range. I like the case that comes with them and it is also nice that there is a pocket on the inside to place the cable for storage. The build quality is great the ear pads are very soft and the extension is smooth but firm. My only reason for going with 4 stars instead of 5 is the size of the ear cup, I wish they were slightly larger.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Kellenberger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable headphones I've ever worn! The sound quality and noise cancellation are both excellent! I did a blind test and could barely tell a difference between these and a $400 pair of Bose, except these were way more comfortable! The packaging was on point and the hat was a sweet little bonus! Also, they just look stylish and sleek! I'm very impressed with these headphones and this company! I love them and would highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have owned good headphones. I am used to buying $10 in ear head phones, and I have loving the change so far. The music just sounds amazing. Everything sounds so crisp and amazing. I love em.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the product - the packing was crafted with immense ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the product - the packing was crafted with immense details and comes with multiple accessories (all that have already been mentioned here). I'm pleased with sound quality and beats my wireless headphones(Jabra Revo) that I used to have prior to them being stolen. Love the styling as well, tend them to wear them as a fashion accessory around the office ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... on these headphones for while now and am so glad to now have a pare
customer_reviews.text: I've had my eye on these headphones for while now and am so glad to now have a pare. The price and the sound are incredible and they are now my favorite ones to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Cheng

customer_reviews.title: and I can say i absolutely love them - Awesome design and quality
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift, and I can say i absolutely love them - Awesome design and quality. They're extremely comfortable and durable. I'd recommend them to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Tim Antoian

customer_reviews.title: The quality (sound as well as physically) so far is great. I would definitely purchase another pair for myself ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift, but I would gladly pay $100. The quality (sound as well as physically) so far is great. I would definitely purchase another pair for myself or a loved one.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Ivie

customer_reviews.title: Stellar for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These are FANTASTIC headphones for under $100. They look great, feel great, and sound fantastic for the price. Lots of padding and the noise cancellation is pretty darn great. They are a little bass-heavy for my taste, but that's an easy EQ fix in Spotify / iTunes. My buddy loves them as-is though.
customer_reviews.author: Josh W.

customer_reviews.title: Headphones that simply deliver
customer_reviews.text: A pair of headphones that look and sound great...all for $100! Clean bass that doesn't boom or distort - definitely better than the Solo 2, Urbanite, or Momentum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Headphones fit comfortably and are easily comparable to the beats headphones. The difference? These headphones are 1/3 of the price ! Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Zeshan Khan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Quality sound and material, a plus is that they look clean and sleek. Awesome headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: UNPLUGGED
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me? I'll take my $100 and buy well known Sony Headphones any day over these. These are $19.99 headphones at best. All of the reviews are fake. None show VERIFIED PURCHASE, maybe one. Please, why would I drop this kind of cash in such a overly saturated market with well known brands with proven track records? Nice try Plugged, but a better name is UNPLUGGED!
customer_reviews.author: dcime

customer_reviews.title: Great Presentation, Great Sound, Awesome Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are awesome. I actually have them on right now, and I honestly forget they are there sometimes because they are so comfortable. The sound is incredible, but keeping them on to block out ambient noise is a great use for them also. The Digital Trends Review seems to be spot on. I absolutely love the sound, and I honestly would have paid in the $150 - $200 range for them. Also -- Killer presentation. Opening that box up with the flat bill inside was fun. They look, feel, sound (and smell) like quality. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

product_meta.title: Plugged Crown Series Headphones, Black/Gold
product_meta.description:
Color:Gold

Plugged is reimaging the personal audio experience with the best pound-for-pound products. Our $99 headphone brings together deep, precise bass, gorgeous vocals and stunning clarity you need to get lost in your playlist. The expert design includes a flexible headband, multi-axis pivoting earcups and precision adjusting sliders for the perfect fit.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




Solid Design We set out to create a headphone that we wanted ourselves: super-premium materials, a comfortable fit, subtle branding, an iconic silhouette that doesn’t make you feel like a billboard. The result is quality that stands toe-to-toe with the “luxury” players.

Superior Sound Our mission was the create a smarter sound—not another dumb bass toy. In order to achieve that level of quality we spent over a year getting the technical components and acoustic design right and, most importantly, optimizing for the music we love—hip hop, pop, rap, EDM.




Scratch-Resistant Finish When you're on the go your gear can take a serious beating. Crown is built from premium grade materials designed to withstand even the roughest commutes.

Ultra Comfortable With plush ear cushions designed to diffuse heat and pressure, Crown lets you keep the music going for hours, free from distractions.

Excellent Noise Isolation Shut out the racket and get lost in your music with our sound isolating ear-cups. No dead-batteries to stand in your way here; just pure melodies delivered unblemished by the roar of your environment.




The Best Headphones Under $100 "The Crown successfully blend style, superior build quality, comfort, noise isolation and a surprising level of sound quality in a headphone that could easily cost double its asking price." - CALEB DENISON @ DigialTrends.com, Audio/Electronics Guru




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

Crafted Personal Sound

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

The market for headphones is saturated with over-priced products that underperform leaving you feeling shortchanged. Plugged was invented to deliver on sound and build quality, authentic values AND price.

What makes your product special?

Respect. The sound is imbued with a respect for the beats and lyrics that force you to feel. The design is inspired by respect for the quality you deserve. Music is too important to be anything short of an incredible experience for everyone.

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

The huge challenge of giving life to a physical product is surpassed only by the joy of watching people love that product. The best part of this is getting to build the instruments that deliver something so incredibly important - music.
feature_bullets: In-line mic with volume & track controls
Includes IOS & android compatible cords, flexible headband, ear cups, sliders & canvas case
